resources.string:
This application is designed to calculate the predicted amount of money that will be saved within a desired timeframe. It helps users easily determine the total savings accumulated over a specific period.

This application is developed for Assessment 1 in the Mobile Programming 1 course.

Copyright © 2025–2026 Fathan Abdul Aziz.
All rights reserved.
Just-Budgetin will calculate the target amount of money you will achieve on the desired day/week/month/year.
